title: Remco Evenepoel Remains a Question Mark for Tour de France: ‘We Still Have Doubts About His Level’
content:
Team boss Patrick Lefevere also reveals new details of the derailed merger: 'I suggested waiting until 2025, but they wanted to do it very quickly.'

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Remains a Question Mark for Tour de France: ‘We Still Have Doubts About His Level’ on Velo.
author: ahood
